mapper.select: SELECT IF ( COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI', 1, 0 ) AS dbIsKey, column_name AS dbFieldName, data_type AS dbType, column_comment AS dbFieldTxt, numeric_scale AS dbPointLength, IF ( numeric_precision, numeric_precision, character_maximum_length ) AS dbLength, IF ( is_nullable = 'YES', 1, 0 ) AS dbIsNull FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE table_name = #{tableName} AND table_schema = (select database())
